title: Marauder Ashe
body:
I am thoroughly dissatisfied with the new Marauder Ashe skin that I just purchased. I have never spent money on this game until last night. I have Dragon Slayer Vayne, Bad Santa Veigar, and Hextech Sion. (Vayne and Veigar were gifted from random people that I met and Sion was given for behavior).
I finally decided to spend money because I love playing Ashe and I thought the Marauder Ashe looked super cool. Come to find out, the only thing that looks cool is her outfit. Other than this, NOTHING else changed. I mean you couldn't change any of the abilities or anything? I'm not asking for something as ridiculous as Heartseeker Ashe. I know that Heartseeker is a very expensive skin so I understand why her arrows look so cool.
But for Marauder Ashe can't you at least change the color or something? How hard would it be to make the arrows black? Idk, maybe I am alone with this opinion, but it seems like something else could be changed about Marauder Ashe.

Hey Goat Blanket,

Sorry to hear you're not happy with the new Marauder Ashe skin.

Since she is a 750 RP skin, she only received a new model and texture. Skins with new particles begin at 975 RP. 

These price tiers were more clearly defined in 2012, and can be found [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752874-Guide-to-Skin-Price-Tiers).

Plus,if you consider Heartseeker Ashe,which is 975, an expensive skin.Then unfortunately, you're going have to get use to skins with unchanged particles if that's all you can afford.

With respect, if you're intelligent/savvy enough to post on the forums about it, then you should be intelligent enough to see what type of skin it was before buying it. It's been discussed repeatedly here.
